data.title: 2020 Directors Roundtable interview - Palm Springs, Fatman & more!
data.meta_description: Entertainment Critic Derek Sant hosted a gathering of directors that created great films in 2020. They discussed their films, the process and the road to becoming filmmakers. He was joined by Max Barbakow (Director of Palm Springs), Sean Durkin (Director of The Nest), Rod Lurie (Director of The Outpost) and The Nelms Bros. Ian and Eshom (Directors of Fatman). They chatted about their films, but Derek also opened up the forum for the Writer/Directors to ask questions of each other.
data.text:
Entertainment Critic Derek Sant hosted a gathering of directors that created great films in 2020.

They discussed their films, the process and the road to becoming filmmakers.

He was joined by Max Barbakow (Director of Palm Springs), Sean Durkin (Director of The Nest), Rod Lurie (Director of The Outpost) and The Nelms Bros. Ian and Eshom (Directors of Fatman).

They chatted about their films, but Derek also opened up the forum for the Writer/Directors to ask questions of each other.

Special thanks to all who helped put this together. More varied panels of Directors to come! With so many directors from amazing film projects this year, we can't wait to see who says yes next!
